8 The functions of the Council shall be Benin of
(1) to advise the Minister on + Conant
{@) the application of science and scientific
research to problems of national
importance for the general benefit
of the community;
) the co-ordination of research in the

into channels vital for national

technical personnel, having regard to

() to initiate, promote and intensify fundamental
and applied research with a view to develop-
ing the economic resources of the country and
: promoting the welfare of the people;
(8) to collect and disseminate information relating
to scientific and technical matters, and to
publish reports, periodicals and papers on
Iatters scientific and technical ;
(4) to establish and maintain liaison with scientific
institutions and scientific workers in other
poe countries in matters relating to science and
: seientific research; and
(5) to do such other things as may be necessary for
the advancement of science and scientific
research in Ceylon.

() make grants in aid of specific research projects

tion;
{@) establish a research fund for the promotion of
scientific research in Ceylon;

or

have made contributions to scientific
knowledge.

{2) The quorum for any meeting of the Council

(& All questions for decision at any meeting of the
Council shall be decided by the vote of the majority
of the members present. In case of an equality of
votes, the presiding officer shall have a casting vote.
